content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with a potential tenant named Haoyu Wang from China.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If no, why not? Could you not agree on a price?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] The potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, offered a price of 550 euros per month, which was too low for me. I was looking for a higher price, and we were unable to reach an agreement.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Haoyu Wang, as an 8. He was respectful, straightforward, and understood the negotiation process.
name: Peter Schmidt

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator

content: [Answer] As Peter Schmidt, I did not feel discriminated or offended during the negotiation. The potential tenant, Haoyu Wang, conducted himself with respect and professionalism throughout the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt
